https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/dXHIEr6cBSL88JNg2RN0YKQedba.jpg When a young war vet returns home from Afghanistan, he struggles to find joy in the life he once knew. As he comes close to giving up all hope, his guardian angel pays a visit to show him there’s more meaning to his life than he’s ever known. A Christmas Hero
